00043 void MMDATFileWriterTest::WriteSmallFileTest()
00044 {
00045         std::string name = "small_DAT_file";
00046         std::wstring type = L"Hg-small";
00047         int32_t rows = 4;
00048         int32_t cols = 5;
00049         int32_t pixelCount = rows*cols;
00050         DATData dataOut(name);
00051         dataOut.SetPixelCount(pixelCount);
00052         dataOut.SetStatsCount(1);
00053         dataOut.SetArrayType(type);
00054         dataOut.SetPixelSize(0.71f);
00055         dataOut.SetScannerType(L"M10");
00056         dataOut.SetScannerID(L"main");
00057         DateTime dtOut = DateTime::Parse(L"12-25-05T11:12:13Z");
00058         dataOut.SetScanDate(dtOut);
00059         dataOut.SetRows(rows);
00060         dataOut.SetCols(cols);
00061 
00062         u_int16_t* expectedPixels = new u_int16_t[rows*cols];
00063 
00064         {       // Force the destruction of the writer before using the reader.
00065 
00066                 MMDATFileWriter writer(dataOut);
00067 
00068                 // Use mem-map to add pixel intensities
00069                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(writer.Open());
00070                 u_int16_t* pixel = writer.GetMappedPixelDataPtr();
00071                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(pixel != 0);
00072 
00073                 for (int32_t row = 0, i = 0; row < rows; ++row)
00074                 {
00075                         // don't re-map data
00076                         for (int32_t col = 0; col < cols; ++col, ++pixel, ++i)
00077                         {
00078                                 *pixel = (u_int16_t)(1000*row+10*col);
00079                                 expectedPixels[i] = *pixel;
00080                         }
00081                 }
00082 
00083                 Uint16Vector stats;
00084                 stats.push_back(0);     // min
00085                 stats.push_back(10000); // max
00086 
00087                 writer.WriteStats(stats);
00088 
00089                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(writer.Close());
00090         }
00091 
00092         // Check that the correct data was written to the file
00093 
00094         DATData dataIn;
00095         DATFileReader reader;
00096         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.SetFilename(name));
00097         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(dataIn));
00098 
00099         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataIn.GetFilename() == name);
00100         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataIn.GetRows() == rows);
00101         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataIn.GetCols() == cols);
00102         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataIn.GetArrayType() == type);
00103         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataIn.GetPixelSize() == 0.71f);
00104         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataIn.GetScannerType() == L"M10");
00105         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataIn.GetScannerID() == L"main");
00106         DateTime dtIn = dataIn.GetScanDate();
00107         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dtIn.ToString() == dtOut.ToString());
00108 
00109         u_int16_t* pixels = new u_int16_t[rows*cols];
00110         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataIn.GetPixels(pixels, 0, dataIn.GetRows()));
00111         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(memcmp(expectedPixels, pixels, sizeof(u_int16_t)*dataIn.GetRows()*dataIn.GetCols()) == 0);
00112 
00113         u_int16_t min, max;
00114         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataIn.GetRange(min, max));
00115         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(min == 0);
00116         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(max == 10000);
00117 
00118         delete [] expectedPixels;
00119         delete [] pixels;
00120 }
00121 
00122 // Write a file larger than 200MB (1024*1024*200 bytes) to exercise the remapping logic.
00123 
00124 void MMDATFileWriterTest::WriteLargeFileTest()
00125 {
00126         std::string name = "large_DAT_file";
00127         std::wstring type = L"Hg-large";
00128         int32_t rows = 11000;
00129         int32_t cols = 11000;
00130         int32_t pixelCount = rows*cols;
00131         DATData dataOut(name);
00132         dataOut.SetPixelCount(pixelCount);
00133         dataOut.SetStatsCount(1);
00134         dataOut.SetArrayType(type);
00135         dataOut.SetPixelSize(0.5f);
00136         dataOut.SetScannerType(L"M10");
00137         dataOut.SetScannerID(L"lab02");
00138         DateTime dtOut = DateTime::Parse(L"12-25-05T11:12:14Z");
00139         dataOut.SetScanDate(dtOut);
00140         dataOut.SetRows(rows);
00141         dataOut.SetCols(cols);
00142 
00143         {       // Force the destruction of the writer before using the reader.
00144 
00145                 MMDATFileWriter writer(dataOut);
00146 
00147                 // Use mem-map to add pixel intensities
00148                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(writer.Open());
00149 
00150                 u_int16_t inten = 10;
00151                 bool stop = false;
00152                 do
00153                 {
00154                         int32_t firstRow = writer.GetFirstPixelRowMapped();
00155                         int32_t numRowsMapped = writer.GetPixelRowsMapped();
00156                         u_int16_t* pixel = (u_int16_t*)writer.GetMappedPixelDataPtr();
00157                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(pixel != 0);
00158                         for (int32_t row = 0; row < numRowsMapped; ++row)
00159                         {
00160                                 for (int32_t col = 0; col < cols; ++col, ++pixel)
00161                                 {
00162                                         if (++inten > 46000)
00163                                         {
00164                                                 inten = 0;
00165                                         }
00166                                         *pixel = inten;
00167                                 }
00168                         }
00169 
00170                         if (firstRow+numRowsMapped >= rows)
00171                                 stop = true;
00172                         else
00173                                 writer.MapPixelData(firstRow+numRowsMapped, writer.GetMaxPixelRowsToMap());
00174                 } while(stop == false);
00175 
00176                 Uint16Vector stats;
00177                 stats.push_back(0);     // min
00178                 stats.push_back(46000); // max
00179 
00180                 writer.WriteStats(stats);
00181 
00182                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(writer.Close());
00183         }
00184 
00185         // Check that the correct data was written to the file
00186 
00187         DATData dataIn;
00188         DATFileReader reader;
00189         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.SetFilename(name));
00190         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(dataIn));
00191 
00192         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataIn.GetFilename() == name);
00193         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataIn.GetRows() == rows);
00194         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataIn.GetCols() == cols);
00195         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataIn.GetArrayType() == type);
00196         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataIn.GetPixelSize() == 0.5f);
00197         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataIn.GetScannerType() == L"M10");
00198         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataIn.GetScannerID() == L"lab02");
00199         DateTime dtIn = dataIn.GetScanDate();
00200         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dtIn.ToString() == dtOut.ToString());
00201 
00202         int32_t MaxRowsToFetch = 1000;
00203         u_int16_t* pixels = new u_int16_t[MaxRowsToFetch*cols];
00204         u_int16_t* expectedPixels = new u_int16_t[MaxRowsToFetch*cols];
00205 
00206         u_int16_t inten = 10;
00207         int32_t startRow = 0;
00208         while (startRow < rows)
00209         {
00210                 int32_t rowsToFetch = MaxRowsToFetch;
00211                 if (startRow + rowsToFetch > rows)
00212                         rowsToFetch = rows - startRow;
00213 
00214                 // Compute the expected values
00215                 for (int32_t row = 0, i = 0; row < rowsToFetch; ++row)
00216                 {
00217                         for (int32_t col = 0; col < cols; ++col)
00218                         {
00219                                 if (++inten > 46000)
00220                                 {
00221                                         inten = 0;
00222                                 }
00223                                 expectedPixels[i++] = inten;
00224                         }
00225                 }
00226 
00227                 // Compare results
00228                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataIn.GetPixels(pixels, startRow, rowsToFetch));
00229                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(memcmp(expectedPixels, pixels, sizeof(u_int16_t)*rowsToFetch*dataIn.GetCols()) == 0);
00230 
00231                 startRow += rowsToFetch;
00232         }
00233 
00234         u_int16_t min, max;
00235         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataIn.GetRange(min, max));
00236         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(min == 0);
00237         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(max == 46000);
00238 
00239         delete [] expectedPixels;
00240         delete [] pixels;
00241 }
